import React from 'react' import { Item } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import '../App.css'; const DEFAULT_IMAGE = 'https://miro.medium.com/max/550/1*TxgjUE2uJuiRUVVmE_kU6g.png' const Post = ({ username, title, posted, id }) => { const urlOfPost = `/${id}` const history = useHistory() const handleOnClick = () => { history.push(urlOfPost) } console.log(posted) return (
{title} {username} {posted}
) } export default Post
